title: (x) Krig-Vig Camping - Cortez {Mark S}
content: Custom or modified, whoever did it please stop!
author: William Berkson

comments.content: Incidentally, that K was an alternate character the original Letraset version that doesn't seem to have made it into the digital version. I'm guessing this logo goes back to the days of rub-down type. It would be easy to modify the digital version if you're trying to recreate it.

Yup. Here it is:   
   
 ![cortez](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516050829im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27585.gif)   
   
I wouldn't be surprised if it was picked because of the K.

Sorry, PTOW. I really find this one awful. I rarely have such a negative reaction to a typeface, and it got the better of my normally sweet temper. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516050829im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
I've never liked Cortez much. I thought it looked like it was already out of style when it was new in 1977.
